other_tests.findings: The liver is diffusely echogenic with a smooth contour; no focal liver mass; patent main portal vein and right portal veins; no flow within the left portal vein, which appears mildly echogenic; no ascites; no intrahepatic biliary dilation; CBD measures 5 mm; gallbladder is decompressed but grossly unremarkable; pancreas appears within normal limits; right kidney is grossly unremarkable; left kidney is not visualized; visualized portions of aorta and IVC are within normal limits.
